monster.name: Polar Bear

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 334, Rise of Tiamat, Storm King's Thunder, Waterdeep: Dragon Heist, Infernal Machine Rebuild, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
